attributes.action: campaign medal for RN,RAF & Army peronnel based Singapore during Malaya Indonesia confrontation
attributes.additional_details: I would request that the MOD and the Government issue a Campaign Medal to veterans like myself who served in Singapore.Brunei and Borneo during the period of the Malaya - Indonesia confrontation where I served four years, firstly on HMS ARK ROYAL and then on HMS DARTINGTON, a coastal minesweeper, our small wooden craft being targeted during patrols
